sentences.english: There is a statue of Avalokitesvara, which is the highest Bodhisattva statue in East China Sea.

sentences.english: Also, music stores in our area report decreased sales of recorded music.

sentences.english: All non-audiovisual submission materials must be in English.

sentences.english: The Alien Life form might not allow them to experience the audio spectrum .

sentences.english: Today, I rented a copy How To Train Your Dragon for my young son to watch.
